property.name: sql
property.value: select p.id as id, o.id as oid, row_number() over() as mid, o.CUSTOMER_NUMBER as customernumber, c.CUSTOMER_NAME as customername, o.CUSTOMER_ORDER_ID as cusorderid, o.EXTERNAL_ID as externalid, p.TRX_AMT as amount, p.CREATE_TIME as createtime, p.PAY_TIME as paytime, p.PAY_STATUS as paystatus, p.PAY_SOURCE as paymethod, o.PAY_CONFIRM as payconfirm, o.BUSINESS_TYPE as bustype, p.CARD_TYPE as cardtype from YMF_ORDER o left join YMF_PAYMENT p on o.ID=p.ORDER_ID and p.TRX_TYPE = 'PURCHASE' left join YMF_CUSTOMER c on c.CUSTOMER_NUMBER=p.CUSTOMER_NUMBER where 1=1 /~customerNumber: and o.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = '[customerNumber]'~/ /~customerName: and c.CUSTOMER_NAME like '%'||{customerName}||'%'~/ /~customerOrder: and o.CUSTOMER_ORDER_ID = '[customerOrder]'~/ /~businessOrder: and o.EXTERNAL_ID = '[businessOrder]'~/ /~timeStart: and p.CREATE_TIME >= '[timeStart] 00:00:00.000000'~/ /~timeEnd: and p.CREATE_TIME <= '[timeEnd] 23:59:59.999999'~/ /~payStart: and p.PAY_TIME >= '[payStart] 00:00:00.000000'~/ /~payEnd: and p.PAY_TIME <= '[payEnd] 23:59:59.999999'~/ /~payStatus: and p.PAY_STATUS = '[payStatus]'~/ /~payTypeInfo: and p.PAY_SOURCE = '[payTypeInfo]'~/ /~payConfirm: and o.PAY_CONFIRM = '[payConfirm]'~/ /~bankCardType: and p.CARD_TYPE = '[bankCardType]'~/ /~bankCardNo: and p.CARD_NO = '[bankCardNo]'~/ /~batchCusOrderNos: and o.CUSTOMER_ORDER_ID in ([batchCusOrderNos])~/ order by o.id desc with ur

property.name: sql
property.value: select d.id as id, row_number() over(order by d.id desc) as row, d.REFUND_ORDER_ID as refundorderid, i.CUSTOMER_NUMBER as customernumber, c.CUSTOMER_NAME as customername, i.CUSTOMER_ORDER_ID as customerorderid, d.YEEPAY_ORDER_ID as yeepayorderid, d.REFUND_AMOUNT as refundamount, d.REFUND_STATUS as refundstatus, d.TRX_AMOUNT as trxamount, d.CREATE_TIME as createtime, d.REFUND_TIME as refundtime, d.PAY_SOURCE as paysource, d.CAUSE as cause from YMF_REFUNDINFO i left join YMF_CUSTOMER c on i.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = c.CUSTOMER_NUMBER left join YMF_REFUND_DETAIL d on i.id = d.REFUNDINFO_ID where 1=1 /~customerNumber: and i.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = '[customerNumber]'~/ /~customerName: and c.CUSTOMER_NAME like CONCAT('%',{customerName},'%')~/ /~refundNo: and d.REFUND_ORDER_ID = '[refundNo]'~/ /~origCustomerOrderNo: and i.CUSTOMER_ORDER_ID = '[origCustomerOrderNo]'~/ /~origOrderNo: and d.YEEPAY_ORDER_ID = '[origOrderNo]'~/ /~payStart: and d.PAY_TIME >= '[payStart] 00:00:00.000000'~/ /~payEnd: and d.PAY_TIME <= '[payEnd] 23:59:59.999999'~/ /~refundAppStart: and d.CREATE_TIME >= '[refundAppStart] 00:00:00.000000'~/ /~refundAppEnd: and d.CREATE_TIME <= '[refundAppEnd] 23:59:59.999999'~/ /~refundSucstart: and d.REFUND_TIME >= '[refundSucstart] 00:00:00.000000'~/ /~refundSucEnd: and d.REFUND_TIME <= '[refundSucEnd] 23:59:59.999999'~/ /~refundStatus: and d.REFUND_STATUS = '[refundStatus]'~/ /~payTypeInfo: and d.PAY_SOURCE = '[payTypeInfo]'~/ order by d.id desc with ur

property.name: sql
property.value: select jl.ID as id, jl.NAME as name from TBL_POS_PRODUCTINFO jl where 1=1 /~mid: and jl.ID = '[mid]'~/ order by id desc with ur

property.name: sql
property.value: select hj.id as id, hj.full_name as signename, hj.CUSTOMER_NUMBER as customernumber, hj.ADDRESS as address, hj.SALES_NAME as salename, hj.CREATE_TIME as createtime from TBL_DAILI_CUSTOMER hj where 1=1 /~mid: and hj.ID = [mid]~/ /~customerNumber: and hj.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = '[customerNumber]'~/ /~startDate: and hj.CREATE_TIME >= '[startDate]'~/ /~endDate: and hj.CREATE_TIME <= '[endDate]'~/ /~customername: and hj.SIGNEDNAME like '%[customername]%' ~/ order by id desc with ur

property.name: sql
property.value: select row_number() over(order by c.id) as rowid, c.id as id, c.CUSTOMER_NUMBER as customernumber, c.CUSTOMER_NAME as customername, case when d.name is null then c.INDUSTRY_TYPE else d.name end as industrytype, case when c.customer_level='A' then '甲级' when c.customer_level='B' then '乙级' when c.customer_level='C' then '丙级' end as customerlevel, case when d1.name is null then c.customer_type else d1.name end as customertype, c.create_time as createtime, c.update_time as updatetime, case when c.status='ACTIVE' then '开通' when c.status='INACTIVE' then '关闭' end as status, c.PAY_TYPE_INFO as paytypeinfo, b.BIZ_NAME as bizcode from YMF_CUSTOMER c left join YMF_DICTIONARY d on d.code=c.industry_type and d.type='IndustryType' left join YMF_DICTIONARY d1 on d1.code=c.CUSTOMER_TYPE and d1.type='CustomerType' left join YMF_BUSINESS b on b.id = c.business_id where 1=1 /~customerNumber: and c.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = '[customerNumber]'~/ /~customerName: and c.CUSTOMER_NAME like '%[customerName]%'~/ /~startDate: and c.create_time >= '[startDate] 00:00:00.000000'~/ /~endDate: and c.create_time <= '[endDate] 23:59:59.999999'~/ /~industryType: and c.INDUSTRY_TYPE ='[industryType]'~/ /~customerLevel: and c.customer_level ='[customerLevel]'~/ /~customerType: and c.customer_type='[customerType]'~/ /~payTypeInfo: and c.pay_type_info like '%[payTypeInfo]%'~/ /~bizCode: and b.biz_code ='[bizCode]'~/ /~status: and c.status='[status]'~/ with ur

property.name: sql
property.value: select row_number() over(order by b.id) as rowid, b.id as id, b.BIZ_CODE as bizcode, b.BIZ_NAME as bizname, b.CREATE_TIME as createtime, b.UPDATE_TIME as updatetime, t.customercount as customercount, case when b.status='ACTIVE' then '开通' when b.status='INACTIVE' then '关闭' end as status from YMF_BUSINESS b left join (select b1.BIZ_CODE as bizcode,count(c1.id) as customercount from YMF_BUSINESS b1 left join YMF_CUSTOMER c1 on b1.id=c1.business_id and c1.status='ACTIVE' group by b1.BIZ_CODE) t on t.bizcode = b.BIZ_CODE where 1=1 /~bizName: and b.BIZ_NAME like '%[bizName]%'~/ /~startDate: and b.CREATE_TIME >= '[startDate] 00:00:00.000000'~/ /~endDate: and b.CREATE_TIME <= '[endDate] 23:59:59.999999'~/ /~bizCode: and b.BIZ_CODE= '[bizCode]' ~/ /~status: and b.status= '[status]' ~/ with ur

property.name: sql
property.value: select row_number() over(order by q.id) as rowid, q.id as id, c.CUSTOMER_NUMBER as customernumber, c.CUSTOMER_NAME as customername, d.NAME as apptype, q.CREATE_TIME as createtime, q.UPDATE_TIME as updatetime, q.QR_ID as qrid, q.SHOP_NAME as shopname, case when q.status is null then 'NOTEFFECT' else q.status end as status from YMF_CUSTOMER c left join YMF_QRCODE q on q.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = c.CUSTOMER_NUMBER and q.STATUS!='DELETE' left join YMF_DICTIONARY d on d.code = c.APP_TYPE and d.type='AppType' where 1=1 and c.STATUS='ACTIVE' /~customerNumber: and c.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = '[customerNumber]'~/ /~startDate: and q.CREATE_TIME >= '[startDate] 00:00:00.000000'~/ /~endDate: and q.CREATE_TIME <= '[endDate] 23:59:59.999999'~/ /~customerName: and c.CUSTOMER_NAME like '%[customerName]%' ~/ /~status: and nvl(q.status,'NOTEFFECT') = '[status]'~/ /~appType: and c.APP_TYPE= '[appType]' ~/ /~qrId: and q.QR_ID= '[qrId]' ~/ with ur

property.name: sql
property.value: select row_number() over(order by q.id) as rowid, q.id as id, c.CUSTOMER_NUMBER as customernumber, c.CUSTOMER_NAME as customername, d.NAME as apptype, q.CREATE_TIME as createtime, q.UPDATE_TIME as updatetime, q.QR_ID as qrid, q.SHOP_NAME as shopname, case when q.status is null then 'NOTEFFECT' else q.status end as status from YMF_QRCODE q left join YMF_CUSTOMER c on q.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = c.CUSTOMER_NUMBER and q.STATUS!='DELETE' left join YMF_DICTIONARY d on d.code = c.APP_TYPE and d.type='AppType' where 1=1 and q.status <> 'DELETE' /~customerNumber: and c.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = '[customerNumber]'~/ /~qrId: and q.QR_ID= '[qrId]' ~/ /~status: and nvl(q.status,'NOTEFFECT') = '[status]'~/ with ur

property.name: sql
property.value: select row_number() over(order by id desc) as rowid, CUSTOMER_NUMBER as customernumber, CREATE_TIME as createtime, entity_name as entityname, opt_type as opttype, operator_name as optname, description, proceed_time as proceedtime, biz_type as biztype from YMF_OPERAT_LOG where 1=1 /~customerNumber: and CUSTOMER_NUMBER = '[customerNumber]'~/ /~startDate: and CREATE_TIME >= '[startDate] 00:00:00.000000'~/ /~endDate: and CREATE_TIME <= '[endDate] 23:59:59.999999'~/ /~entityName: and ENTITY_NAME = '[entityName]' ~/ /~optType: and OPT_TYPE = '[optType]'~/ /~optName: and OPERATOR_NAME = '[optName]' ~/ /~bizType: and BIZ_TYPE like '%[bizType]%' ~/ with ur

property.name: sql
property.value: select row_number() over(order by id desc, TYPE) as rowid, id, type, code, value, name, create_time as createtime, update_time as updatetime, status, CAN_DELETE as candelete from YMF_DICTIONARY where 1=1 /~type: and TYPE = '[type]' ~/ /~code: and CODE = '[code]' ~/ /~name: and NAME like '%[name]%' ~/ /~status: and STATUS = '[status]' ~/ with ur

property.name: sql
property.value: select row_number() over(order by r.customer_number, r.app_id, r.CREATE_TIME desc) as rowid, r.id, r.CUSTOMER_NUMBER as customernumber, c.CUSTOMER_NAME as customername, r.APP_ID as appid, r.APP_SECRET as appsecret, r.CREATE_TIME as createtime, r.UPDATE_TIME as updatetime, r.status from YMF_WECHAT_REL r LEFT JOIN YMF_CUSTOMER c on r.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = c.CUSTOMER_NUMBER where 1=1 /~customerNumber: and r.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = '[customerNumber]' ~/ /~appid: and r.APP_ID = '[appid]' ~/ /~customerName: and c.CUSTOMER_NAME like '%[customerName]%' ~/ /~status: and r.STATUS = '[status]' ~/ /~startDate: and r.CREATE_TIME >= '[startDate] 00:00:00.000000' ~/ /~endDate: and r.CREATE_TIME < '[endDate] 23:59:59.999999' ~/ order by r.customer_number, r.app_id, r.CREATE_TIME desc with ur
